title: In-Water Survey Metrics Package
text:
Welcome to the In-Water Survey Metrics R package documentation site.
This guide will help you: - Install the package - Understand required data formats - Run your first analysis - Explore individual functions - Export and visualize results
Start with the Installation page.

title: In-Water Survey Metrics R Package
text:
The following code will retrieve NCRMP data for the Florida Keys 2024 survey and save it as ‘FKEYS2024’ object in your R environment

FKEYS2024 <- getRvcData(years = 2024, regions = "FLA KEYS")

title: In-Water Survey Metrics R Package
text:
